thread.title: Tomas Berdych extends winning run with Stockholm success
thread.title_full: Tomas Berdych extends winning run with Stockholm success

title: Tomas Berdych extends winning run with Stockholm success
text:
Tomas Berdych extends winning run with Stockholm success 25 Oct 2015 18:01:56 
comments 
Tomas Berdych stretched his winning run to 12 matches with his third Stockholm Open title thanks to 7-6 (7/1) 6-2 victory over Jack Sock. 
The top-seeded Czech, who has already qualified for the Barclay ATP World Tour Finals in London in November, won his second title of the year without dropping a set. 
The American actually earned the first break of the final, but Berdych broke back when Sock served for the opening set at 5-4 and went on to dominate the tie-break. He then won the second set without facing a break point. Related Sport News
